title: Vegetarian Stuffed Aubergines
ingredients: ['2 aubergines', '1 large onion', '1 tin plum tomatoes, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '300g Quorn mince', '1 carton passata', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon mixed dried herbs', 'salt, to taste', 'crushed black pepper, to taste', '3oz cheddar cheese, grated', '3oz mozzarella cheese, grated', '1 tin Heinz Potato & Leek Soup']
